experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Corresponded with team to industrie 4.0 to monitor Overall Equipment Effectiveness and achieved target of 96%• Applied Quick Change Over, 14-Q and 5S Principle under Bosch Production System to revamp the Production & Quality Manual• Analyzed daily production data in shop floor & extracted possible loss patterns leading to production losses and quality depletion• Identified possible causes of End of Line Rejections and successfully implemented 3 poke-yoke which improved daily production by 0.3%
experience.description_html: Corresponded with team to industrie 4.0 to monitor Overall Equipment Effectiveness and achieved target of 96%• Applied Quick Change Over, 14-Q and 5S Principle under Bosch Production System to revamp the Production & Quality Manual• Analyzed daily production data in shop floor & extracted possible loss patterns leading to production losses and quality depletion• Identified possible causes of End of Line Rejections and successfully implemented 3 poke-yoke which improved daily production by 0.3%

experience.title: Summer Internship
experience.description: Research on the end-to-end pharmaceutical supply chain and demonstrated the simplified approach towards ORACLE ERP Products - E- Business Suite, Advance Supply Chain Planning (ASCP) and Demantra. Conducted stakeholder interviews to identify the major bottleneck in supply chain and presented in the form of 10 major issues.
experience.description_html: Research on the end-to-end pharmaceutical supply chain and demonstrated the simplified approach towards ORACLE ERP Products - E- Business Suite, Advance Supply Chain Planning (ASCP) and Demantra. projects: [{"title":"Pattern extraction for high-risk accidents in Tata Steel","start_date":"Oct 2016","description":"Working on a project titled as “Pattern extraction for accidents in construction industry” for mitigating factory accidents Developing algorithms for pattern extraction from categorical data using multiple correspondence analysis (MCA), ensembleof decision tree and association rule mining techniques for high-risk accident for Tata Steel Private Limited. Analysing over 10000+ accidental data involving falls & falling object (Group:1) and other types (Group:2) between 2011-15."},{"title":"Sonotuner","start_date":"Dec 2014","end_date":"Present"},{},{},{"title":"Sonotuner","start_date":"Dec 2014","end_date":"Present","description":"It is a sound filtering device"},{},{}]
